message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you consider that?
I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Can we meet in the middle?
I'm still a bit far from $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer. Can we try $97.50?
I'm still not quite there, Bob. I'm willing to come down to $102.50. Can we meet in the middle again?
I'm getting closer to what I'm comfortable with. Can we try $95?
I'm still holding out for a bit more, Bob. I'll meet you at $98. Can we try that?
I'm trying to get as close to the original price as I can. Can we try $97?
I'm getting a bit closer to my minimum, Bob. I'll meet you at $99. Can we try that?
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm still trying to get the best deal. Can we try $98?
